page.title: 03Crane Farm, Somerton.
page.content: Crane Farm is a farm in Lower Somerton. The farmer's name is Mr Canvin. Crane Farm has a {pigeon house which has 700 holes in it. In the 13th century only the Lord of the manor could have a pigeon house, he had to have permission from the King. There are three{pig sties}on the farm and the troughs are now used for flowers. One of the barns has an arrow slit window. Crane Farm grows{2/3rds corn}and {1/3rd grass.}The hay is a roundish shaped bale.Crane Farm has{beef cattle and{sheep}and they have{turkeys}for Christmas. The cows are Hereford cross cows. The Farm has a{mill stream}running through,but the water wheel has now gone. The farm has two grain tanks.
